name: Cookie Chaos
description:
After baking some gingerbread men, they jumped off the cookie sheet and escaped! Now there's 12 little gingerbread men running around your house! Can you find them all? 

Free Assets used: 

-Brackeys 2D Mega Pack: fireplace

-Pixel Adventure 1: brown, green, gray backgrounds, brick tiles

-TooCubeForest: wood and snow tile pieces

-Christmas Piano Music: Jingle Bells, Jingle Bell Rock, Joy to the World.

All of the furniture, plants, and characters were drawn by me.  Hope you enjoy!
